name: Celestial Slice
description:
Celestial: positioned in or relating to the sky, or outer space as observed in astronomy.

Slice: A golf shot that moves severely left to right for right-handed hitters and the opposite way for left, which also happens to be the most common shot shape in golf.

This is my submission for Mini Jam 130 to which the theme is Lunar

Play golf through 3 unique courses all taking place in space

  • Tutorial: A 9-hole course that showcases nearly all of this game's features
  • Lunar Surface: A more standard mini-golf game, taking place in one of the craters on Earth's moon
  • Oops all moons: Do you like rotating orbs?

Controls:

  • Use the mouse to look around
  • Hold left-click and push the mouse forward to charge your shot
  • Hold right-click at the same time and move the mouse to adjust the vertical angle of your shot
  • Release left-click to launch the golf ball
  • Press R to reset to the last place you launched the ball
  • Hold tab to open the in game menu

The tab menu will allow you to restart the level or entire course.
